warnings: Warnings For external use only When using this product Do not get into eyes Stop use and ask a doctor if Condition worsens Symptoms last more than 7 days or clear up and occur again within a few days Do not use on Deep or puncture wounds Animal bites Serious burns Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
indications: Uses Helps prevent and temporarily protects chafed, chapped or cracked skin
